org.dblp.mmdb

Interface MmdbInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Mmdb

    public interface MmdbInterface
    A general interface for the main memory database (MMDB).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.stream.Stream<Booktitle> booktitles()
      Retrieves a sequential stream of all booktitles in the MMDB.
      Booktitle getBooktitle(java.lang.String title)
      Search for the booktitle object with the given booktitle string.
      java.util.Collection<Booktitle> getBooktitles()
      Retrieves an unmodifiable Collection view of all booktitles in the MMDB.
      Journal getJournal(java.lang.String title)
      Search for the journal object with the given journal title string.
      java.util.Collection<Journal> getJournals()
      Retrieves an unmodifiable Collection view of all journals in the MMDB.
      Person getPerson(java.lang.String key)
      Search for the person with the given key.
      PersonName getPersonName(java.lang.String name)
      Search for the person name object with the given name string.
      java.util.Collection<PersonName> getPersonNames()
      Retrieves an unmodifiable Collection view of all person names in the MMDB.
      java.util.Collection<Person> getPersons()
      Retrieves an unmodifiable Collection view of all persons in the MMDB.
      Publication getPublication(java.lang.String key)
      Search for the publication with the given key.
      java.util.Collection<Publication> getPublications()
      Retrieves an unmodifiable Collection view of all publications in the MMDB.
      default PublicationStream getPublicationStream(java.lang.String title)
      Search for the publication stream (of any given type, i.e., booktitle or journal) with the given title string.
      default java.util.Collection<PublicationStream> getPublicationStreams()
      Retrieves an unmodifiable Collection view of all publication stream venues (i.e., all booktitles and journals) in the MMDB.
      default Record getRecord(java.lang.String key)
      Search for the record (of any given type, i.e., publication, person, or redirect) with the given key.
      default java.util.Collection<Record> getRecords()
      Retrieves an unmodifiable Collection view of all records (i.e., all publications, persons, and redirects) in the MMDB.
      Redirect getRedirect(java.lang.String key)
      Search for the redirection record with the given key.
      java.util.Collection<Redirect> getRedirects()
      Retrieves an unmodifiable Collection view of all redirects in the MMDB.
      java.util.stream.Stream<Journal> journals()
      Retrieves a sequential stream of all journals in the MMDB.
      int numberOfBooktitles()
      Retrieve the number of booktitles in the MMDB.
      int numberOfJournals()
      Retrieve the number of journals in the MMDB.
      int numberOfPersonNames()
      Retrieve the number of person names in the MMDB.
      int numberOfPersons()
      Retrieve the number of persons in the MMDB.
      int numberOfPublications()
      Retrieve the number of publications in the MMDB.
      default int numberOfPublicationStreams()
      Retrieve the number of publication stream venues (of any given type, i.e., booktitle and journal) in the MMDB.
      default int numberOfRecords()
      Retrieve the number of records (of any given type, i.e., publications, persons, and redirects) in the MMDB.
      int numberOfRedirects()
      Retrieve the number of redirects in the MMDB.
      java.util.stream.Stream<PersonName> personNames()
      Retrieves a sequential stream of all person names in the MMDB.
      java.util.stream.Stream<Person> persons()
      Retrieves a sequential stream of all persons in the MMDB.
      java.util.stream.Stream<Person> personsParallel()
      Retrieves a parallel stream of all persons in the MMDB.
      java.util.stream.Stream<Publication> publications()
      Retrieves a sequential stream of all publications in the MMDB.
      default java.util.stream.Stream<PublicationStream> publicationStream()
      Retrieves a combined, sequential stream of all publication stream venues (i.e., all booktitles and journals) in the MMDB.
      default java.util.stream.Stream<Record> records()
      Retrieves a combined, sequential stream of all records (i.e., all publications, persons, and redirects) in the MMDB.
      java.util.stream.Stream<Redirect> redirects()
      Retrieves a sequential stream of all redirects in the MMDB.

      • getPublication

        Publication getPublication(java.lang.String key)
                    throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Search for the publication with the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the publication to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The publication, or null if there is no such publication.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified key is null.

        Returns:
        The publications.

      • getPerson

        Person getPerson(java.lang.String key)
          throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Search for the person with the given key. Person redirections ("crossref") will not be resolved.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the Person to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The person, or null if there is no such person.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified key is null.

      • getRecords

        default java.util.Collection<Record> getRecords()
        Retrieves an unmodifiable Collection view of all records (i.e., all publications, persons, and redirects) in the MMDB.
        Returns:
        The records.

      • records

        default java.util.stream.Stream<Record> records()
        Retrieves a combined, sequential stream of all records (i.e., all publications, persons, and redirects) in the MMDB.
        Returns:
        The stream of all records.

        The number of records.
